runkoserver.service

Class ElementService

  • java.lang.Object
    • runkoserver.service.ElementService

  • @Service
public class ElementService
extends Object
    Class for repository-interactions of Elements.

        Returns:

                             Person whoIsLoggedIn)

        Parameters:
        id - element id
        whoIsLoggedIn - current logged user
        Returns:
        was delete successful

      • createContent

        public Content createContent(String name,
                             String textArea,
                             List<Long> areaIds,
                             Person owner)
        Creates a new Content with the given attributes. Does NOT save created content to repository.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the content
        textArea - text area of the content
        areaIds - IDs of the Areas the content is published in
        owner - creator of content
        Returns:
        the new Content object

      • updateContent

        public boolean updateContent(Long elementId,
                             String name,
                             String textArea,
                             List<Long> areaIds,
                             Person whoIsLogged)
        Updates a Content element's attributes, if the currently logged in Person is the owner of the Content.
        Parameters:
        elementId - id of the content element
        name - updated name for content
        textArea - updated textArea for content
        areaIds - updated list of Area IDs the content is published in
        whoIsLogged - the Person who is logged in
        Returns:
        true if update was successful, false if not

      • deleteAllElements

        public boolean deleteAllElements()
        Deletes all Elements from the repository.
        Returns:
        was repositories emptied.

      • findElementsByOwner

        public List<Element> findElementsByOwner(Person person)

      • addBookmark

        public void addBookmark(Person person,
                        Content content)
        Saves a new Content bookmark for the Person.
        Parameters:
        person - the person who will get a new bookmark
        content - the content that will be bookmarked

      • deleteBookmark

        public void deleteBookmark(Person person,
                           Content content)
        Deletes a Content bookmark from a Person's bookmarks.
        Parameters:
        person - who the bookmark will be deleted from
        content - which Content's bookmark will be deleted
